actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

official_title: A bill to amend section 903(a) of title 38, United States Code, to ensure a dignified burial for veterans buried pursuant to a contract entered into under such section.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to ensure that a casket furnished for a veteran who dies in a Veterans' Administration facility be of a specified quality and that the body be properly embalmed, appropriately dressed, and a flag be furnished.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 903(a) of title 38, United States Code, to ensure a dignified burial for veterans buried pursuant to a contract entered into under such section.
